title: 一念逍遙(Overmortal)
description: Overmortal is an immersive idle mobile game adorned with a distinct ink-painting art style. The game beyond idle gameplay, immersing cultivators in elixir refining, artefact forging, sect life, and battles among thousands on the path to ascension.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Overmortal is an ink-painting idle mobile game where cultivators refine elixirs, forge artefacts, join sects, and rise through battles.
<!--text-->
Overmortal is a serene idle cultivation game, painted in delicate ink strokes. Step freely onto the path of ascension and savour the daily life of a cultivator.
 In this world, you take on the role of a mortal at the threshold of breakthrough. Cultivate to shed your mortal shell and defy fate in your pursuit of ascension. Wield your sword to traverse hidden wonders and tranquil realms, forge bonds with fellow Taoists and uncover the secrets of your forgotten origins.
 
 —An ink-painting realm brushed in verdant hues, where the pursuit of ascension winds endlessly through boundless skies.
 Inspired by traditional ink-painting aesthetics and classical mythology, such as the Investiture of the Gods and the Classic of Mountains and Seas, Overmortal weaves a graceful cultivation world steeped in the elegance of Taoist fantasy.
 —A carefree path of idle gameplay awaits; cultivate with ease and ascend to the celestial realm in a single breath.
 Overmortal features an idle cultivation system. Even when you’re offline, the game continues to simulate real-time cultivation progress for consistent rewards. You can also connect and interact with fellow cultivators across servers anytime.
 —Amidst thousands of fellow Taoists, hunt for treasure, vanquish demons, and walk the path of ascension together.
 Overmortal is developed with a proprietary multi-server architecture that supports cross-server sect wars, large-scale demon-slaying, team raids, and inter-realm social interactions—breaking free from the idea that idle games are single-player games.
 —With thousands of Taoists and countless sects, your journey on the path of longevity shall never be walked alone.
 In Overmortal, you’ll find a rich variety of sect features. Join or establish your own sect to meet fellow cultivators, earn exclusive resources, and greatly enhance your power. Face off in sect confrontations and decisive PVP battles where your strength will be put to the test!
 —Cultivate freely, seize fortune through fortuitous encounters, and journey beyond the limits of time and space.
 Overmortal features a unique multi-path cultivation system. Choose any one—or all four—paths of cultivation: Ghostia, Swordia, Corporia, and Magicka. Leave no stone unturned to uncover ancient relics, tame mystical beasts, and refine spirit elixirs and gear. —A single breakthrough may bring overnight transformation!
 May every cultivator achieve immortality and find freedom in the journey of Overmortal!
 Unbothered by the world and unafraid of the path ahead, you walk your own way in peace. In Overmortal, cross paths with your destined companion, vow your eternal bond under the witness of thousands of fellow cultivators, and let love bloom across the skies. Enjoy exclusive online benefits: quick teleportation, shared skills, and more. When you're caught in danger, your companion can instantly sense your plight, rush to your side, and witness your growth and transformation.
